        class LessonModel
        {
            public string UnitId { get; set; }
            public string Id { get; set; }
            public string Name { get; set; }
            public string Content { get; set; }
        }
        static async System.Threading.Tasks.Task Main(string[] args)
        {
            Console.OutputEncoding = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8;
            Console.WriteLine("Set path to txt file");
            var path = Console.ReadLine();
            string input = File.ReadAllText(path);
            string regex = "\r\n[\\s]*([0-9]+[.]?[0-9]*[.](?![0-9])(?!Тело – плоть)(?!Дух – сердце)(?!Душа – разум)(?!Сторона).*)\r\n";
            var contents = Regex.Split(input, regex);
            using FileStream fileSteam = File.Create(path.Replace(".txt", ".json"));

            string UnitId = GetUnitId(contents[0]);
            contents = Regex.Split(ApplyReplacements(input, UnitId), regex);

            var lessonModel = new LessonModel() { UnitId = UnitId };
            var lessonsList = new System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList<LessonModel>();
            var numberRegex = "([0-9]+[.]?[0-9]*)[.]";
            for (int i = 1; i < contents.Length; i++)
            {
                if (i % 2 == 1)
                {
                    var split = Regex.Split(contents[i], numberRegex);
                    lessonModel.Name = Regex.Split(contents[i], numberRegex)[2];
                    lessonModel.Id = Regex.Match(contents[i], numberRegex).Value;
                    lessonModel.Id = lessonModel.Id.Substring(0, lessonModel.Id.Length - 1);
                }
                else
                {
                    lessonModel.Content = contents[i].Replace("\r\n", "<br>");
                    lessonsList.AddLast(lessonModel);
                    lessonModel = new LessonModel { UnitId = UnitId };
                }
            }

            await JsonSerializer.SerializeAsync(fileSteam, lessonsList, new JsonSerializerOptions() { WriteIndented = true, Encoder = System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping });
        }

        private static string GetUnitId(string contents)
        {
            if (contents.Contains("Бытие"))
            {
                return "Быт";
            }
            if (contents.Contains("Исход.(1446"))
            {
                return "ИсхСол";
            }
            if (contents.Contains("             Деяния."))
            {
                return "ДеянОткр";
            }
            if (contents.Contains("        Евангелия."))
            {
                return "Евн";
            }
            if (contents.Contains("Основы Веры."))
            {
                return "Осн";
            }
            if (contents.Contains("         Пророки."))
            {
                return "Прор";
            }
            return "";
        }
